typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	parameter1 as date
}
source(output(
		Product_ID as integer,
		Product_Name as string,
		UnitPrice as double,
		Category as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> srcSAFCCase
srcSAFCCase derive(Product_Name_abr = left(Product_Name, 3)) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		Product_ID as integer,
		Product_Name as string,
		UnitPrice as double,
		Category as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> snkCaseInfo
